lock.LockService.name: LockService
lock.LockService.doc: Prevents concurrent access to sections of code. This can be useful when you have multiple users or processes modifying a shared resource and want to prevent collisions.

method.name: getDocumentLock
method.doc: Gets a lock that prevents any user of the current document from concurrently running a section of code.

method.name: getScriptLock
method.doc: Gets a lock that prevents any user from concurrently running a section of code.

method.name: getUserLock
method.doc: Gets a lock that prevents the current user from concurrently running a section of code.

lock.Lock.name: Lock
lock.Lock.doc: A representation of a mutual-exclusion lock.

method.name: hasLock
method.doc: Returns true if the lock was acquired.

method.name: releaseLock
method.doc: Releases the lock, allowing other processes waiting on the lock to continue.

method.name: tryLock
method.doc: Attempts to acquire the lock, timing out after the provided number of milliseconds.

argument.name: timeoutInMillis
argument.doc: how long to wait to acquire the lock, in milliseconds

method.name: waitLock
method.doc: Attempts to acquire the lock, timing out with an exception after the provided number of milliseconds.

argument.name: timeoutInMillis
argument.doc: how long to wait to acquire the lock, in milliseconds
